mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement: Where your every whim is our top priority!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into my favorite coffee shop, ready to conquer the day with my latte in hand. But as I reached the counter, horror struck-my usual barista wasn't there. Instead, a new face, with the audacity to ask, "What can I get you?" I mean, please! As a loyal customer of this establishment, I demand consistency and familiarity. I couldn't possibly lower myself to explain my usual order to this novice. So, did I gracefully accept the situation and order like a mature adult? Absolutely not. I huffed, grabbed my phone, and dialed the cafe's customer service, demanding to speak with the manager. After a brief (and very heated) conversation, the manager promised to inform the staff of my preferred drink for future reference. Ah, the sweet taste of vindication! Another day, another victory for the entitled!
